mapper.insert: insert into running_schedule_tb (running_time, running_date, start_time, end_time, movie_id, theater_id) values (#{runningTime}, #{runningDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{movieId}, #{theaterId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id as running_schedule_id, m.movie_name, m.running_grade, r.running_date, r.start_time, r.end_time, COUNT(s.seat_name) AS exist_seats, t.total_seat FROM running_schedule_tb AS r INNER JOIN movie_tb AS m ON r.movie_id = m.id INNER JOIN theater_tb AS t ON r.theater_id = t.id LEFT JOIN seat_tb AS s ON r.id = s.running_schedule_id WHERE r.movie_id = 1 AND r.running_date LIKE '2023-12-24%' GROUP BY r.id, m.movie_name, r.running_date, r.movie_id, r.theater_id, t.total_seat ORDER BY r.running_date ASC;
